The target must succeed on a @Check[fortitude|dc:40|basic] save. If they fail, they are unable to use the Cast a Spell or Sustain a Spell actions during their next turn.

120 feet. At the start of the Shelled Wanderer's Turn, it may create or destroy the terrain around it. It can create a wall 40 feet long and 20 feet high or destroy an equal amount of material, adding it to the collection of materials it carries. Creatures that are standing in an affected area must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:40|basic] save. On a success, they may move out of the area on the side of their choice. On a failure, they are knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and either lifted up or left to fall, as appropriate. Dealing 40 damage to a section of wall creates a 5x5x5 hole can be created in the wall. The wall takes half damage from magic, except sonic, which deals double damage to it.
As long as the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, they have vulnerability 20 to all damage.
The target must succeed on a @Check[fortitude|dc:40|basic] save. If they fail, they are unable to use the Cast a Spell or Sustain a Spell actions during their next turn.
Any ongoing magical spells on the target are dispelled. The target takes @Damage[(2d12+16)[force]] for every spell dispelled in this manner.

The Shelled Wanderer's emits a shrieking blast of sound that obliterates objects and creatuers in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] Living creatures in the area take @Damage[24d8[sonic]|options:area-damage] damage. They also take an additional @Damage[4d8[force]] damage for every invested magic item they are carrying. (@Check[fortitude|dc:45|basic] save for both effects). Unattended objects in the area take full damage and are usually destroyed in the process. Once this is used it cannot be used again for [[/br 1d4+1]] rounds.

The shelled wanderer may stride twice. During this movement it may make a single Claw, Leg, or Jaws attack against any creature that it moves within reach of. All attacks are made at its highest bonus.
